physical_appearance: The darkroom safelight has a black body and a white lamp at its centre. It is accompanied with a two-pin black wire. It comes with an instruction manual and a packing box. The name 'Wotan' is displayed on the base, at the right hand side, of the darkroom safelight as well as its images on the packing box and on the instructional manual. A red switch is also present on the left side of the base of the darkroom safelight. The packing box contains an image of the Duka 50 Universal darkroom safelight, attached to its front
sgcool_label_text: A safelight is a light source that is appropriate to be used in a darkroom setting. It provides illumination without damaging the photographic material. This set of safelight is part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm, which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.
context_21: 45 Jalan Pemimpin, #09-00 Foo Wah Industrial Building, Thomson, Singapore
title_text: Duka 50 universal darkroom safelight with instructions manual
subject_terms_1: photographic processing equipment lighting devices flourescent lighting
context_20: The set of equipment was used by The Picture Farm Pte Ltd
subject_terms_2: Photography Equipment and supplies Photography Lighting
